 #include <iostream>
    #include <stdio.h>
    #include <string.h>
     
    using namespace std;
    int S(unsigned int n)
    {
    	int sum=0;
    	while(n!=0)
    	{
    		sum+=(n%2==0)?2*(n%10):n;
    		n=n/10;
    	}
    	return sum%10;
    }
    int fun(unsigned int n)
    {
    	int res=0;
    	while(n%10!=0)
    	{
    		res+=S(n-1);
    		n--;
    	}
    	n=n/10;
    	return res+45*n;
    }
    int main()
{
	unsigned int t;
     cin>>t;
     unsigned int a,b;
     while(t--)
     {
     	int output=0;
     	cin>>a>>b;
     	
     	output=fun(b+1)-fun(a);
     	cout<<output<<endl;
     	
     }
     
    return 0;
}
